annotation.spannedText: There's a worry that introducing chickenpox vaccination for all children could increase the risk of chickenpox and shingles in adults

classMention.mentionClass: There's a worry that introducing chickenpox vaccination for all children could increase the risk of chickenpox and shingles in adults

annotation.spannedText: If you vaccinate children against chickenpox, you lose this natural boosting, so immunity in adults will drop and more shingles cases will occur

classMention.mentionClass: If you vaccinate children against chickenpox, you lose this natural boosting, so immunity in adults will drop and more shingles cases will occur

annotation.spannedText: If you find out you are pregnant within a month of having the chickenpox vaccine, it's best to contact your GP for advice

classMention.mentionClass: If you find out you are pregnant within a month of having the chickenpox vaccine, it's best to contact your GP for advice
